en-us:
This is an unofficial open source client for the bitwarden password manager. This client is based on the original bitwarden mobile client with added support for Windows 10, Windows 10 mobile, Windows 10 S and Xbox One.

This client includes support for:
 - Using Windows Hello to unlock the vault
 - Offline read support after authenticating
 - Using the YubiKey OTP for 2FA

All of the source code and more information is available here: https://github.com/alistair23/bytewarden-windows

- Update to Xamarin.Forms 2.5
 - Add YubiKey OTP support
 - Logo visibility improvements
 - General button layout improvements
 - Improvements to the vertical scrolling issues
 - Logout after 5 failed login attempts
